title: "Hey, you could have built Sunfire or armor. That would have evened out the fight with Riven a lot"
body:
(At 30 minutes into the game)

{{champion:86}} (Before the title) "When I get Sunfire, it's all over

{{champion:86}} Nah I always get Visage, then Black cleaver.

For God's sake, people. Never "ALWAYS" build something first. BUILD TO COUNTER YOUR ENEMY LANE AND COMP.
